user.title: Connect to Hisense TV
user.description:
Enter the IP address of your Hisense TV.
After clicking "Next", a PIN code will appear on the TV screen.

data_description.tv_ip: IP address of the TV on the local network (e.g. 192.168.1.100)

pin.title: Authentication ({tv_ip})
pin.description:
MAC address: {mac_address}

Enter the 4-digit PIN code displayed on the TV screen.

data_description.mac_address: MAC address of the TV (detected automatically)

error.wrong_pin: Incorrect PIN code. Please try again
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the TV. Make sure it is turned on
